ConfigurationAtom.Title: Configure PayPal Payments Advanced

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.VENDOR
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: This is the login name you created when signing up for PayPal Payments Advanced.

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.USER
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: Instead of entering a Merchant Login, you can enter a User Login. A User Login is what PayPal recommends because it provides enhanced security and prevents service interruption if you change your Merchant Login password. You can set up a User Login and profile in PayPal Manager.

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.PWD
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: This is the password you created when signing up for PayPal Payments Advanced or the password you created for API calls.
